content: As a reward, Chen Loong will give you a special scroll to visit the Zodiac Village, where several merchants will now permanently reside, including the Shen Monkey. Since he stays at this location, be sure to visit him often to keep on top of upgrades and new purchases:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shen_Monkey_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Shen Monkey Questline', specifically from the subsection 'In the the Zodiac Village'.
The content is as follows:
As a reward, Chen Loong will give you a special scroll to visit the Zodiac Village, where several merchants will now permanently reside, including the Shen Monkey. Since he stays at this location, be sure to visit him often to keep on top of upgrades and new purchases:
